subject: RE: [junit] Re: (3.8) NullPointerException from ComparisonFailure
msgSnippet: Thankyou very much. IMO this is quite a serious screw up.  When is this going to be rolled into a release version? Shaun.
messageBody:
Thankyou very much.

IMO this is quite a serious screw up. When is this going to be
rolled into a release version?

Shaun.
